snippet: An appeals court in Milan sentenced former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi to four years in prison and imposed a five-year ban on his holding public office.
abstract: Italian appeals court upholds conviction of former Prime Min Silvio Berlusconi for tax fraud, sentencing him to four years in prison and imposing five-year ban on his holding public office.
lead_paragraph: An appeals court in Milan sentenced former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi to four years in prison and imposed a five-year ban on his holding public office.
